name: Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon Girl
text:
Dark Magician Girl + 1 Blue-Eyes monster
If this card is Fusion Summoned, you can target 1 Spell in your GY; add that target to your hand. (Quick Effect): You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; destroy 1 card on the field. While this monster is on the field, your opponent cannot target any other "Dragoon" monsters you control for an attack.
